con:testCase.name: NODE_USER_SAML_ASSERTION Row Validator

con:testStep.name: Assert Expected NODE_USER table row count
Obtain Difference Between CREATED_DATE and TOD in Seconds
Obtain Difference in Hours between CREATED and EXPIRATION columns
Assert NODE_USER_SAML_ASSERTION has proper row count for UUID
Assert NODE_USER_SAML_ASSERTION and NODE_USER are in sync
Assert NODE_USER_SAML_ASSERTION and NODE_ACCOUNT are in sync
If AffiliateMember repeat validation for AffiliateMember Data
